message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great value and I think you'll get a lot of use out of it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer of $10000, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. How about $11500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11250?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?
